title: A South Carolina death row inmate picks a firing squad over the electric chair - NPR
content:
1. A South Carolina death row inmate picks a firing squad over the electric chair  NPR
  2. South Carolina death row inmate chooses to be executed by firing squad over the electric chair  CNN
  3. Richard Moore's execution will make him the first in South Carolina since 2011  News 19 WLTX
  4. South Carolina Inmate Chooses To Die by Firing Squad Over Electric Chair  The Daily Beast
  5. South Carolina Death-Row Inmate Chooses Firing Squad Over Electric Chair  The Wall Street Journal
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Richard Bernard Moore is the first prisoner in South Carolina to face the choice of execution methods since the state made electrocution the default and gave inmates the option to face rifles instead.
